bug.author: philippefoubert
bug.description: The <opencv2/tracking.hpp> header included in opencv\samples\cpp\tutorial_code\features2D\AKAZE_tracking\planar_tracking.cpp is missing. I am working with the code from head OpenCV 3.1.0-dev (Version control: 3.1.0-639-gfdd20d7-dirty). Regards, Philippe.

comments.comment: Right, this header is from opencv_contrib
Can I contribute to this by adding the appropriate header file
